menu.name: Paneer Tikka
menu.description: Cubes of paneer marinated in spices and grilled to perfection.

menu.name: Samosa
menu.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.

menu.name: Papdi Chaat
menu.description: Crispy wafers served with boiled potatoes, chickpeas, and yogurt.

menu.name: Hara Bhara Kabab
menu.description: Vegetarian kababs made with spinach, potatoes, and green peas.

menu.name: Onion Bhaji
menu.description: Crispy fritters made from thinly sliced onions mixed with spices.

menu.name: Butter Chicken
menu.description: Tender pieces of chicken cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

menu.name: Dal Makhani
menu.description: Creamy lentils cooked with butter and spices, a North Indian classic.

menu.name: Palak Paneer
menu.description: Cottage cheese cubes cooked in a creamy spinach gravy.

menu.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
menu.description: Grilled chicken cooked in a rich tomato-based sauce with aromatic spices.

menu.name: Chole Bhature
menu.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fried bread.

menu.name: Gulab Jamun
menu.description: Soft and spongy milk solids soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

menu.name: Rasmalai
menu.description: Sweet cottage cheese dumplings soaked in flavored milk.

menu.name: Kheer
menu.description: Indian rice pudding made with milk, rice, and flavored with cardamom.

menu.name: Gajar Halwa
menu.description: Sweet dessert pudding made with carrots, milk, and sugar.

menu.name: Jalebi
menu.description: Deep-fried batter soaked in sugar syrup, crispy and sweet.
